description:
Eye sheet patches to reduce eye bags and reduce dark circles, enriched with orange juice and hyaluronic acid.

If your eye contour looks tired and dull, this sheet mask offers you our most effective solution for an awake, brighter and fresh looking eye contour. It is infused with an ultra-light depuffing and revitalising formula enriched with orange juice and hyaluronic acid. It diffuses hydration and provides incredible freshness for immediately energised and depuffed eyes. This mask has a super cooling effect: -4C at application^. This eye sheet mask is biodegradable by home-compost*.

PROVEN EFFICACY:

In 15 minutes:
- Intensely rehydrates
- visibly depuffs under eyes
- Eye bags & dark circles less visible.
In 1 week:
- Fresh and brighter eye look
- Eye area is energised
- Open and rested eye look
Self assessment: on 102 women after one single use,after 3 applications per week.

All Garnier products are officially approved by Cruelty Free International.
Since 1989, Garnier has been committed to a world without animal testing.

*the sheet mask is compostable in home-compost conditions only. Otherwise, it should be discarded in general household waste. ^Instrumental test - 26 subjects.

Infused with an ultra-light depuffing and revitalising formula enriched with orange juice and hyaluronic acid.

This mask has a super cooling effect: -4C at application^, for an even stronger icy sensation, keep it in the fridge before use. ^Instrumental test - 26 subjects.

Biodegradable by home-compost. The sheet mask is compostable in home-compost conditions only. Otherwise, it should be discarded in general household waste.

Suitable for sensitive skin. Fragrance free.

Vegan formula (no animal derived ingredients or by-products).
name: Garnier Eye Tissue Mask Hyaluronic Acid & Orange Each
